childMarkdownRemark.html:

Experienced human resources director Ashley Soupen has joined Sidra Medical and Research Center in the role of Chief Human Resources Officer. In this capacity, Mr. Soupen will take full responsibility for driving organizational and people strategy and will lead the strategic human resource planning and execution necessary for Sidra to attract and retain the highest caliber of staff. Mr. Soupen will report directly to Sidra’s Chief Executive Officer, Dr. William F. Owen, Jr., MD, FACP.

Mr. Soupen has extensive experience of managing human resources (HR) at a senior level in a range of geographical settings, including the Middle East, Africa and Europe. He previously held the position of Human Resources Director, Emerging Markets at Honeywell International Inc., a leading global technology and manufacturing company. Prior to this he held roles with Honeywell in Europe and Africa. Before he joined Honeywell, Mr. Soupen held positions of increasing seniority within African Oxygen Limited (AFROX), a market leading manufacturer and distributor of welding products.
